stimulusHtml: Increases in public investment in education and increased educational attainment by workers willÂ have which of the following effects in the long run?
choicesHtml: Labor productivity will increase, and real GDP per capita will increase.
Labor productivity will increase, and real GDP per capita will decrease.
Labor productivity will increase, and real GDP per capita will not change.
Labor productivity will decrease, and real GDP per capita will increase.
Labor productivity will decrease, and real GDP per capita will decrease.
